content.query:
CREATE VIEW [reporting].[dim_products]
	AS 
	SELECT 
	p.Product_ID, p.Name, p.Product_Number, p.Color, p.Standard_Cost, p.List_Price, p.Size, p.Weight, p.Sell_Start_Date, p.Sell_End_Date,
	p.Discontinued_Date, p.Modified_Date, pc.Name AS [Product_Category], pm.Name AS [Product_Model]
	FROM
	[dbo].[product] p 
	left join [dbo].[ProductCategory] pc on pc.Product_Category_ID = p.Product_Category_ID
	left join [dbo].[ProductModel] pm on pm.Product_Model_ID = p.Product_Model_ID
